name: The Right Hallway
description:
You must survive from the demon lurking in the shadows. You can't escape, but you can hide! The only hiding spot you have is the shrinking room where the walls close in on you. You can't stay there for too long though, so you must transition to the attic. As you examine the mirror in there, you feel an unsettling energy about it...

Controls:

Mouse: Flashlight and clicking

Arrow keys: Look behind or forward
